rule:
Punch nazis, trebuchet terfs.
Any posts or usage which contain nazi symbolism or ideology, or which contain "gender-critical"/"just asking questions" tripe will get you banned immediately and without recourse. Weird pizza toppings are "unpopular opinions", human rights are not.

Be nice.
No racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination. In absence of clarity, assume positive intent.

rule:
Don't ruin it.
queer.party is a freely-provided and unmonetised service. Don't abuse it, don't use it to abuse federated instances, don't try to break things.

rule:
Be considerate.
Respect others that use this service, and keep in mind that any public post you make might show up in the public timelines of this and other instances that federate with queer.party. Use content warnings, use NSFW tags, don't be a jerk about it.

rule:
Don't be (outwardly) horny.
NSFW isn't banned, but your profile (avatar, header, display name, bio, etc) must be completely safe, or they will be removed. Be courteous with content warnings and don't make them overly explicit.

No bots

rule: No harassment, violence or disparagement! Do not send aggressive unwanted criticism, disparaging remarks, unwanted advances, stalk other users, vague post, post opinions related to anti-kink activism (e.g. kink shaming) and do not circumvent blocks. rule: No abusive ideals related to consent! While clearly marked fiction is fine, we take a hard stance against those with ideals that advocate harmful contact in real life and movements which seek to normalize harmful attractions. This includes beliefs, iconography, and/or labels related to sexual or romantic contact between adults and minors (e.g. MAPs), humans and animals (e.g. zoophilia), or others who cannot or did not consent (this includes labels such as "radqueer" and "pro-para").

rule: Only post consensual and legal content! When posting sexual content, all parties must have consented to its creation and it being posted. That means no revenge porn, no sexual content featuring real or realistic renderings of people under the age of 18, and no sexual content of real animals. This includes external links to services where such content is typically hosted (e.g. Session).

rule: No spam or undisclosed bots! Do not use your account to excessively advertise products and services. rule: Do not post anything that would be classified as illegal in the United States.
preprocessed rules: do not post anything that would be classified as illegal in the united states

rule: Do not post, request or threaten to post personal information or personally-identifying information ("dox"), whether it is "publicly available" or not. Do not post content that identifies anonymous or pseudonymous people unless they have willingly and publicly published that content themselves. The single caveat to this is users who have aggitated or gone after Fediverse, its health, Poast or it's mods or any of the above. Do not post any links to Google Docs and other known phishing or tracking websites. Creating accounts or services for the express purpose of documenting users, activities or otherwise engaging in stalking behavior will not be tolerated.

rule: Spam of any kind involving posting, deleting, frivolous reports, etc. will not be tolerated.
preprocessed rules: spam of any kind involving posting deleting frivolous reports etc will not be tolerated

rule: Creating accounts to agitate or otherwise divide the community on various topics are not tolerated.

rule: Do not use multiple accounts to circumvent people blocking you or to evade bans, silences or other moderation measures.
preprocessed rules: do not use multiple accounts to circumvent people blocking you or to evade bans silences or other moderation measures

rule: Mark your account as a bot if the majority of posting will be automated.

rule: We do not allow accounts that are solely used to advertise a product or service. Accounts that advertise while also being an active part of the community are permitted. Unused or bot-run accounts with advertising in their profile are not permitted, even if they do not actively spam. The advertisement and/or solicitation of 18+ paysites (OnlyFans, etc) is forbidden.

rule: Parody accounts are acceptable, however you must state in your bio that it is a parody or your account will be terminated for impersonation.
